body_html:
So... is ATen supposed to set the current device when it does CUDA operations? I would think this is a less error-prone (for clients) way to do it, but AutoGPU is not actually in ATen proper so there doesn't seem to be an idiomatic way to write it at the moment.

At the moment, it looks like we're relying on the Python bindings to handle it, but that doesn't feel very good to me...
